title: Understanding Entropy Change
text: When a substance dissolves, the molecules become more spread out. How does this affect disorder and entropy?

title: Key Characteristics of Entropy
text: Entropy is a measure of disorder. Systems with more disorder have a higher entropy.

title: Analyzing the Process
text: When a sugar cube dissolves, the sugar molecules move from an ordered, structured form to a more random distribution in the tea.
